review: Its nice if ur wifi is strong, but hard to understand how to work at first, esp personal video from your cell. But its very nice to have during the holidays.
author: Cepada R Wiley

review: If you know what HDMI and USB ports are and you know how to connect to your wifi, you'll be streaming from your phone/ laptop in minutes. If you don't know what I'm talking about... why are you even considering buying a wireless device that streams just about any online media from your phone to your tv? Do you even know what a youtube is?
author: daniel barry

review: Was nice when it first came out but loses to fire tv stick now.
author: HcP

review: The Chromecast has been an excellent purchase! We stream music from Rhapsody and watch movies from our Netflix account all the time! It's easy to install and even easier to use. The price is perfect. I highly recommend this product!
author: Amazon Customer

review: It does display the screen on the TV -- but is is too slow to show streaming video from the computer to the TV.  The picture stops and then restarts a lot.
author: Vegas John "John"

review: I bought this I really... really... like it...I WATCH EVERYTHING ON MY TV RIGHT FROM MY PHONE...... VERY EASY SET UP....I WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND IT....
author: Sharron Gardner
